title: Cryptomultiplier
author: Cryptomultiplier
content: We should look at some benefits of the DCA strategy as in regards to BTC, that is beyond just having a great return on investment. There could be larger portfolio investors that may in one way or the other influence the market and many at times it is often a fault of other users who see no importance of investing in such coin/crypto project, that causes it.So when the subject of DCAing BTC arises, besides just the profit one stands to gain and the discipline that's learned in the process, DCAing BTC will indirectly help to curb the underlying principles of concentrated power and market influence that comes with only a certain large portfolio kind-of-individuals obtaining more BTC than the rest.While Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) basically focuses on managing the risks that are associated with market volatility, it can help reduce any monopsony-like effects and thus ensure that the market is favorable and less controlled by a certain large portfolio individuals.*What do you think?

comments.author: EL MOHA
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on March 12, 2025, 06:25:40 PMSo when the subject of DCAing BTC arises, besides just the profit one stands to gain and the discipline that's learned in the process, DCAing BTC will indirectly help to curb the underlying principles of concentrated power and market influence that comes with only a certain large portfolio kind-of-individuals obtaining more BTC than the rest.While Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) basically focuses on managing the risks that are associated with market volatility, it can help reduce any monopsony-like effects and thus ensure that the market is favorable and less controlled by a certain large portfolio individuals.If i get you correctly you’re trying to say that DCA by investors will help stop or reduce the circulation of supply been centered to few large portfolio which can actually reduces market manipulation, personally I agree with the first statement that many investors buying bitcoin using DCA method are actually helping in dispersing bitcoin circulation but in terms of market manipulation I don’t think some investors no matter how they DCA can actually have effect. Although bitcoin already isn’t manipulatable because it is already in decentralized circulation but aside this if it wasn’t the big portfolio will still have the manipulating power. For example an investors who DCA by buying $1k of bitcoin weekly would still need close to a year to Match the manipulating power someone who buys like 1btc will definitely have a bigger market manipulation power

And I'm not sure if it will reduce some kind of monopoly or control by entities.Bitcoin is too big right now to be controlled by anyone, not by government and certainly by whales. Just used DCA as you see fit and obviously, it's more of the most effective strategy that we can used here as a investors. You don't have to overthink that manipulation, just go simply invest at your own phase. If there is manipulation, it's not going to last in this market.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I kind of agree, but with the entry of millionaires, billionaires, trillion-dollar investment companies like BlackRock, even governments, is monopsony evitable?The market isn't anymore in the 2017 era when bull runs and dips are mainly retail-driven. Recently, price movements are institution-led. The entry of financial products offered by traditional institutions changed the playing field. Indeed, DCA somehow tempers the degree of monopsony in the market. Furthermore, the DCA approach somehow makes retail investors perpetual buyers, but what's $10, $20, $50 compared to hundreds of millions, even more than a billion, of a single purchase by institutions?

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Speaking of DCA  - I already have it for 12 days, where I believe what I allocated in this DCA bot I set up is relevant, small, but I believe it still matters. As I set this up to buy Bitcoin every day.For me, the biggest advantage of DCA is more distributed buying power where if more people buy Bitcoin or use DCA, the market has a steady influx of buyers (especially retail buyers), reducing reliance on large investors.

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Every holder has some influence in the Bitcoin market, especially those who regularly follow the DCA method and buy Bitcoin and hold it for a long time, they are basically buying Bitcoin regularly on a weekly basis. In terms of buying Bitcoin, although their weekly purchase amount is higher between $20 and $100 in the case of regular DCA method, but those who make big investments and have institutions buy Bitcoin for a long time and invest in Bitcoin. Maybe they buy Bitcoin two to three times in their holdings and invest. And among those who follow the DCA method and are buying Bitcoin regularly, you can notice El Salvador because they buy an average of one Bitcoin per day according to the DCA method. And I think small Bitcoin DCA method investment holders play a large role in buying Bitcoin in the market.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on March 12, 2025, 06:25:40 PMWhile Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) basically focuses on managing the risks that are associated with market volatility, it can help reduce any monopsony-like effects and thus ensure that the market is favorable and less controlled by a certain large portfolio individuals.Obviously, the DCA methord has more advantage than just helping a single investor buy at the different market condition, it makes you feel like a boss and enables you achieve far more result than you can ever think yourself capable of achieving at the time you started investing.The effect of having a lot of small scale investing doing DCA more often will keep the market going smoothly more towards a bullish direction so the actions of the whales don't necessarily have to always have a sharp impact on the market. If a thousand small scale investors DCA $150 worth of Bitcoin a week, it's going to make up $1.5k worth of Bitcoin coming from a simple DCA investment that cost a single investor close to nothing.

comments.body: of course everyone has their own way to get bitcoins, some with Average down, Lump sum and DCA, but in my opinion any strategy is good as long as we intend to invest in btc for the long term and of course all techniques and methods of accumulating btc of course in my opinion have advantages and disadvantages. talking about DCA, this technique is indeed very good and I also like to do DCA to accumulate btc because in the midst of fluctuations in btc prices, by doing DCA of course this will have a good impact because sometimes we buy at low prices sometimes high but what is certain is that with DCA we get btc prices that are not too expensive and not too high. but honestly I personally don't pay much attention to what is called Monopsony because in my opinion the most important thing is that we buy btc for the long term but indeed by using the DCA technique in accumulating btc of course we will prevent monopsony which eventually those who have btc will be evenly distributed. but the most important thing in btc investment in my opinion is that we must be able to get profit no matter what happens.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Darker45 on March 13, 2025, 01:57:02 AMIndeed, DCA somehow tempers the degree of monopsony in the market. Furthermore, the DCA approach somehow makes retail investors perpetual buyers, but what's $10, $20, $50 compared to hundreds of millions, even more than a billion, of a single purchase by institutions? I also agree with you, and at the same time, I get the point that the OP is making: those $10 and hundreds of dollar DCA purchases from single investors around the world might not appear to be much if looked at individually, but if the total number of people doing that little purchase is added together, there will be a big number that sums up that can't just easily be overlooked. It won't be anything or cause any effect like the single purchase of institutional investors with larger capital, but it's still worth it to reduce how much those investors hold and control.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Many of us here already knows the importance of using the DCA strategy to invest into Bitcoin. With DCA, investors get to buy Bitcoin at different prices (in decreasing or increasing order) so that they don't miss out the opportunity to buy at a certain low, for example if the price is falling, most investors might not just want to put in all their money to buy but would rather invest bit by bit while watching for the price to dip more. Some people too invest using DCA strategy because of how their income is paid, if they receive monthly salary, they can only invest after they get paid.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on March 12, 2025, 06:25:40 PMWhile Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) basically focuses on managing the risks that are associated with market volatility, it can help reduce any monopsony-like effects and thus ensure that the market is favorable and less controlled by a certain large portfolio individuals.*What do you think?I think Dollar Cost Averaging is a great idea and I recommend it to everyone instead of just FOMO'ing in.  It has mental benefits too as it helps you to keep an open mind on the price.  When in dips, instead of being totally frustrated that your nest egg is disappearing, you are able to easily identify the silver lining in that you are now going to stack more BTC going forward.  Not to mention that it is less straining on you financially to buy small amounts over a long period of time, as opposed to buying a large stack at once.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Pretty much agree with you. First of all, DCA teaches us how to be patient and not to be a crazy buyer. I am not talking about whales or institutions. They have different strategies to accumulate Bitcoin, though a few institutional investors follow the DCA strategy. This strategy works very well for us as small investors. Everyone we are involved with has some business or job, so we don't have big funds to accumulate Bitcoin at once. Besides, it's less risky to invest; DCA reduces pressure on investors. But at the end, we can gain a handsome amount of Bitcoin by following the DCA strategy.
